intro.title: Less work, more customers
intro.lead: UnAd is a simple, easy to use marketing platform that allows you to send text message announcements to your customers.

how-it-works.title: How It Works
how-it-works.lead: It only takes a few minutes to get started.

0.title: Sign Up
0.description: Simply enter your phone number and business name to get started.

1.title: Share Link
1.content: Receive a link to share with your customers. You can post it anywhere online, or just share it directly with your customers in person.

2.title: Send Messages
2.content: Text back the number you received your one-time code from and start sending messages to your customers.

items.title: Simplicity
items.description: No need for complicated setup and campaign management. UnAd is easy to use and requires no technical knowledge.

items.title: 100% SMS, No Apps
items.description: Every interaction with UnAd is done via SMS. No need for you or your customers to download an app.

items.title: On-Demand Marketing
items.description: UnAd allows you to send messages to your customers whenever you want. No need to wait for a campaign to start.

items.title: Reach Those Who Care
items.description: Your messages only go out to customers who have opted in to receive them. No spam, no wasted messages.

items.title: SEO Enabled
items.description: Your subscription link is fully SEO enabled, so customers can find you when they search for your business.

items.title: Affordable
items.description: UnAd starts at just $10 per week. No contracts, no commitments. Pay only for what you use.

name-explainer.title: What's with the name?
name-explainer.description: The name "UnAd" is a sort of portmanteau of "Unobtrusive" and "Advertising".  The idea is that the ads are unobtrusive because your customers explicitly sign up to receive the ads directly from you. And when they are already interested in your product or service, and are more likely to engage with your ad.
